subject: United Nations Headquarters
body:
United Nations Headquarters Regional Office.
Room No. M-13047 ,New York, NY 10017
General Info.: (212) 963-6249
http:/ /www.un.org/en/hq/dm/pdfs/oppba/Financial%20situation%20factsheet.pdf
http:/ /www.un.org/en/hq/dm/pdfs/oppba/Regular%20Budget.pdf
 
File Ref:UNC/IMF/ZBU/WB/002/2023
Re UNFDP/X01/MDG/23
 
TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN!
 
To:Mr. James Kenneth Polla
This is from the United Nations Fund development Program contacting you
because of the global Economic Fund Crisis in addition with the corona virus pandemic, The United Nations has come with what they called (HCDI) Human Capital development index AND Millennium Development GOLD,( MDG), this was after the they check the statistic of world growth economy.
 
After all this We the United Nations Fund Development Program   Has set a department which is Pay settlement Commission (PSC), This commission has been authorized by the IFC and Millennium Development GOLD,( MDG) 
HDI human development index  by (UNDFP) to pay out those was in victims involved in several ways. This act is meant for   (PCI) Per Capital Income.
The above mentioned has mandated us to be in charge of the new settlement paid by Money Gram and Western Union with other Money Agencies for $350 Million announced by the IFC department and of Justice OF( UNFDP)
This settlement payout has been authorized to be compensation to those who lost their money in  pursuing their Contract/Inheritance and lottery fund,on these mentioned process as a to their lost as a result of scam victims via money gram and western Union ETC starting from the Year 1991 till date Dec 31sth . 2023.
 
You have been merged as part of the scammed victims to be compensated for payout with the sum of $10.5 million.
Hope you have been informed correctly.
Mrs Elizabeth YORK.
Accredited PAYMENT Officer.
UNFDP
Contact email
(
unfdp-fund@unfdp.com
)

subject: Re:   United Nations Headquarters
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth York,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the United Nations Fund Program. I appreciate you providing me with this information about the HCDI Human Capital Index and Millennium GOLD, MDG. It's interesting to hear about the efforts being made by the United Nations in response to the global economic crisis and the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.

I understand that your department, the Pay Settlement Commission (PSC), has been authorized to handle the settlement payments for those who have been victims of scams involving Money Gram, Western Union, and other money agencies. It's good to know that steps are being taken to support individuals who have lost money due to fraudulent activities.

Could you please provide more details on how this payout process works? How does one qualify for this settlement? And what are the next steps for someone like me who has been identified as a victim?

Best wishes,
Terry
